Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: It's much easier to interrogate the feedback from an AI as it has endless time and can adapt to your mode of communication, rather than you having to adapt to its.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI is much more collaborative and free-flowing.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI requires more critical analysis (though the teacher doesn't fully avoid this -- there is always a gap between their comments and the moderated CRA marking process!)
